Line 96: Line 96:
== Campaign ==
== Campaign ==
  +
[[File:2011 Egyptian Constitutional Referendum process in English.svg|thumb|A diagram that explains the 2011 Egyptian Constitutional Referendum process based on a Yes or No vote on 19 March 2011]]
The Egyptian military called for a media silence over the referendum.<ref>[http://www.almasryalyoum.com/en/node/360922 Egypt military calls for media silence on referendum beginning Friday], ''[[Al-Masry Al-Youm]]''</ref>It also set up a committee to review the proposed amendmends.<ref>[http://www.almasryalyoum.com/en/node/348045 Armed Forces form committee to analyze opposition to amendments], ''[[Al-Masry Al-Youm]]''</ref> Later saying it would help to secure a vote on the proposed amendments.<ref>[http://www.almasryalyoum.com/en/node/352530 Army to help secure vote on Constitution changes], ''[[Al-Masry Al-Youm]]''</ref>
The Egyptian military called for a media silence over the referendum.<ref>[http://www.almasryalyoum.com/en/node/360922 Egypt military calls for media silence on referendum beginning Friday], ''[[Al-Masry Al-Youm]]''</ref>It also set up a committee to review the proposed amendmends.<ref>[http://www.almasryalyoum.com/en/node/348045 Armed Forces form committee to analyze opposition to amendments], ''[[Al-Masry Al-Youm]]''</ref> Later saying it would help to secure a vote on the proposed amendments.<ref>[http://www.almasryalyoum.com/en/node/352530 Army to help secure vote on Constitution changes], ''[[Al-Masry Al-Youm]]''</ref>
